You're a 90's kid if:

You've ever ended a sentence with the word "SIKE!"

You can sing the rap to "The Fresh Prince Of Bel Air"

You remember when Kurt Cobain, Tu Pac, River Phoenix, and Selena died.

You know that "WOAH" comes from Joey from "Blossom" and that "How Rude!" comes from Stephanie from "Full House"

You remember when it was actually worth getting up early
on a Saturday to watch cartoons.


You got super excited when it was Oregon Trail day in computer class at school.

You remember reading "Goosebumps"

You know the profound meaning of "Wax on, wax off"

You have pondered why Smurfette was the only female smurf.

You took plastic cartoon lunch boxes to school.

you danced to "wannabe" by the Spice Girls, Females: had a new motto, Males: got a whole lot gay-er. (so tell me what you want, what you really really want.)

You remember the craze then the banning of slap bracelets and slam books.

You still get the urge to say "NOT" after (almost) every sentence...Not...

Where in the world is Carmen San Diego? was both a game and a TV game show.

Captain Planet.

You knew that Kimberly, the pink ranger, and Tommy, the red* Ranger were meant to be together.

To the last sentence you said.....hey...Tommy was the green* ranger!!!!

*later to be white

When playing power rangers with friends you fought over who got to be who............and still all ended up being tommy.

You remember when super nintendo's became popular.

You remember watching home alone 1, 2 , and 3........and tried to pull the pranks on "intruders"

"I've fallen and I can't get up"

You remember going to the skating rink before there were inline skates

Two words... Trapper Keeper.

You ever got injured on a Slip 'n' Slide

You wore socks over leggings scrunched down

"Miss Mary Mack, Mack, Mack, all dressed in black, black, black, with silver buttons, buttons, buttons, all down her back, back, back" SHE ASKED HER MOTHER MOTHER MOTHER FOR FIFTY CENTS CENTS CENTS TO SEE THE ELEPHANTS PHANTS PHANTS JUMP OVER THE FENCE THE FENCE THE FENCE
he jumped so high high high he touched the sky sky sky and he didnt come back back back til the forth of july ly ly he jumped so low ow ow he stubbed his toe toe toe and thats the end end end of the elephants show show show

You remember boom boxes vs. cd players

You remember New Kids on The Block when they were cool

You knew all the characters names and their life stories on "Saved By The Bell"

You played and or collected "Pogs"

You had at least one Tamagotchi, GigaPet or Nano and brought it everywhere

You watched the original Care Bears, My Little Pony, and Ninja Turtles

NANCY DREW AND THE HARDY BOYS WERE THE BEST MYSTERY BOOKS

Yikes pencils and erasers were the stuff!

All your school supplies were "Lisa Frank" brand.(pencils.notebooks.binders.etc.)

You remember when the new Beanie Babies were always sold out.

You used to wear those stick on earings, not only on your ears, but at the corners of your eyes.

You remember a time before the WB.

You've gotten creeped out by "Are You Afraid of the Dark?"

You know the Macarena by heart.

"Talk to the hand" ... enough said

You thought Brain woud finally take over the world

You always said, "Then why don't you marry it!"

You remember when everyone went slinky crazy.

You remember when razor scooters were cool.

when we were younger:

Before the MySpace frenzy.

Before the Internet & text messaging.

Before Sidekicks & iPods.

Before MIKE JONES

Before PlayStation2 or X-BOX.

Back when you put off the 5 hours of homework you had every night.

WHEN LIGHT UP SNEAKERS WERE KOOL

When you rented VHS tapes, not DVDs.

When gas was $0.95 a gallon & Caller ID was a new thing.

When we recorded stuff on VCRs & paid $3.50 for a movie.

When we called the radio station to request songs to hear off our walkmans.

When 2Pac and Biggie where alive.

When the Chicago Bulls were the best team ever.

Way back.

Tag.

Get Over Here!!!! means something to you.

Hide-n-Go Seek at dusk.

Red Light, Green Light.

Heads Up 7 Up.

Playing Kickball & Dodgeball until your porch light came on.

Hopskotch.

Slip-n-Slides.... now there are just ghetto ones

Tree Houses.

Hula Hoops.

Reading R.L. Stine's Goose Bumps.

HELLO....HOT WHEELS!!!!!

"POWER OF LOVE" BY CELINE DION..ONLY COUPLES COULD SKATE TO THIS.

The annoying Nano Pets & Furbies.

Running through the sprinklers.

That "Little Mermaid"

Crying when Mufasa died in the Lion King.

Happy Meals where you chose a Barbie or a Hot Wheels car.

Getting the privelage to sit in the front seat of the car.

Drinking Sqeeze It "Squeeze The Fun Out Of It"

CAPRI SUN

Watching Saturday Morning Cartoons in your PJ's still wrapped up in your TMNT, Power Rangers, Barbie, Fairy Princess comforter.

Hey Arnold, Doug, Rugrats.

The original Power Rangers

Or what about:

AAAHH!! REAL MONSTERS.

"CITY GUYS"...ROLLW/ THE CITY GUYS

doug.

magic school bus.

flash forward.

pete and pete.

legends of the hidden temple.

hey dude.

dinosaurs.

blossom.

hangin with mr.copper.

wishbone.

beatnik's world. (boot leg version of bill nye)

MR RODGERS!!!!

Who could forget Snick? & Nick @ Nite with Bewitched, I Dream of Jenie, The Facts of Life & I Love Lucy.

Where everyone wanted to be in love after watching The Wonder Years.

or nick jr. with face

gulah gulah island

little bear

under the unbrella tree

PEE-WEE!!!

The Big Comfy Couch

Kool-Aid was the drink of choice.

Wearing your new shoes on the first day of school.

Class field trips.

POGS

When Christmas was the most exciting time of year.

When $5 seemed like a million, & another dollar a miracle.

When you begged to go to McDonalds for dinner everyday.

When Toys R Us overuled the mall.

Go back to the time when:

Decisions were made by going 'eeny-meeny-miney-moe'.

Mistakes were corrected by simply exclaiming 'do over!'

'Race issue' ment arguing about who ran the fastest.

Money issues were handled by whoever was banker in 'Monopoly'.

It wasn't odd to have two or three 'best' friends.

Being old referred to anyone over 20.

A chance to skate as a couple at the local roller rink was like winning the lottery.

Scrapes & bruises were kissed & made better.

It was a big deal to finally be tall enought to ride the 'big people' rides at the fair.

When playing Nintendo was the hardest thing ever.

When Ninja Turtles ruled the world.

DID I DO THAAAAAAAAAT???

smud and yak back. skip it and pop it.

Before we realized all this would eventually disappear

who would have thought youd miss the 90's so much!!!!!

Saw some country ass black people at the Strawberry Festival last night. Damn. Everyone was out there, the people there look soooooooo much different. It was a big mix of black, white and spanish people. Very diverse crowd there. Had lots of fun going on extreme rides with Sa-rah and getting a drive by titty twister from Sean. Okay so anyways I'm home now, as in FTL. It always feels as if I never left, it's always home here. Grandpa says too many bad words, grandma died her hair so now she looks 50, Diamonde is getting sooooooooo tall, and mom is so active lately. The only thing I can eat here is Pop Tarts and Eggos. Everything else is healthy. Ick. Okay, I think I'm gonna go to bed because it's the only thing to do. I guess I could watch TV. Okay, goodnight.

I've become one of those annoying laptop kids in class! yay! THis is a one time thing. lol. I had to do a paper today. Five hours, nine pages. Yup! 3104 words! It was exhausting and boring as hell. I stayed in one place for the whole time. The second floor of the bookstore where all the seating is. It's so relaxing. Someitmes I cant stand the library, i dont like the lighting and it's too quiet and too cold and it isnt open enough. It was for my film class. We had to analyze a scene from a movie shot by shot! Sooooooooooo boring. I did Back to the Future. I chose the scene where they try out the time machine for the first time. I am so glad I got that paper done. Thank you God! I prayed that I would get it done in ample time and I did, although I waited to do it till the day it was due, I still did it in time. And afterwards I had time to eat and see friends so it's all good. Now I am in my film class and I'm watching this ridiculously weird movie. I dont even know if this is the same movie i started out watching. What the hell is going on? I guess this is the future or something. Maybe I should do this more often. I like writing what is presently happening. It's fun! Brittish accents are awesome. man that bitch is rude. Last week we were watching a filmm clip and my prof. burped into the microphone! He didnt know it was on. Worse yet, he wore a pink hat with a brown houndstooth blazer and dark brown slacks. wtf mate, wtf. Okay, now this old lady is getting her face stretched out. Further than I can stretch mine! What the hell is this movie about? Brittish movies are bloody weird mate. I could go on forever because there's weird shit happening all the time.Whoa, like now. Wow, look at their hair. Mmmmmm, that looks good. Bon jour!!!!!!!!! Okay that's enough goodbye.

Human nature................ I hate being human. lol.

Today was a pleasant day. Aventura is a nice mall, always like going down there. Walked out with no shopping bags, yay! everytime I walk away from something I really really really really want to buy, I feel empowered and I also feel like I saved money, lol. I have enough sweaters and that shirt probably wouldnt look good on me anyways. I'm not muscular. There was an overload of nice clothes at the biggest Macy's men's store I've ever seen. They had a seperate store for men that took up the entire floor! Finaly, It seems like woman's clothes are like 75 percent of most dept. stores. Last night was pretty good too, had a long talk with G & S, cleared up a few things. Now I have to pack. Leaving at 9am in the morn. Packing sucks, I just want to go and everything follow behind me. Clothes should have feet. Whatever. Can't wait to get back to tampa, relax and have high speed internet connection again. And my comfortable bed! It'll be awesome.

DID YOU KNOW THIS ABOUT VODKA?



1. To remove a bandage painlessly, saturate the bandage with vodka. The solvent dissolves adhesive.

2. To clean the caulking around bathtubs and showers, fill a trigger-spray bottle with vodka, spray the caulking, let set five minutes and wash clean. The alcohol in the vodka kills mold and mildew.

3. To clean your eyeglasses, simply wipe the lenses with a soft, clean cloth dampened with vodka. The alcohol in the vodka cleans the glass and kills germs.

4. Prolong the life of razors by filling a cup with vodka and letting your safety razor blade soak in the alcohol after shaving. The vodka disinfects the blade and prevents rusting.

5. Spray vodka on vomit stains, scrub with a brush, then blot dry. 

6. Using a cotton ball, apply vodka to your face as an astringent to cleanse the skin and tighten pores.

7. Add a jigger of vodka to a 12-ounce bottle of shampoo. The alcohol cleanses the scalp, removes toxins from hair, and stimulates the growth of healthy hair.

8. Fill a sixteen-ounce trigger-spray bottle and spray bees or wasps to kill them.

9. Pour one-half cup vodka and one-half cup water in a Ziplock freezer bag and freeze for a slushy, refreshable ice pack for aches, pain or black eyes.

10. Fill a clean, used mayonnaise jar with freshly packed lavender flowers, fill the jar with vodka, seal the lid tightly and set in the sun for three days. Strain liquid through a coffee filter, then apply the tincture to aches and pains.

11. To relieve a fever, use a washcloth to rub vodka on your chest and back as a liniment.

12. To cure foot odor, wash your feet with vodka.

13. Vodka will disinfect and alleviate a jellyfish sting.

14. Pour vodka over an area affected with poison ivy to remove the oil from your skin.

15. Swish a shot of vodka over an aching tooth. Allow your gums to absorb some of the alcohol to numb the pain.

16. NEVER DRINK THE STUFF - IT'LL KILL YOU!!

Boomers, laser tag, video games, go carts were all fun when we were kids. Nice to go back, kind of, and experience it all again but it still isnt quite the same, just memerable. Friends are cool. Everyone and their moms where at "The Walk" yesterday. Geez. I didnt even remember some of their names because I havent seen them in such a long time. Oh, I bought a really good book at the bookstore yesterday. That's it for now, spending new years with Mr Bahaw y Esteban. Which is becoming a "tradition" as they say all though this is just the second time. Anyways Happy New year and don't do anything stupid. Final post of the year. 2005 sucked................. The end

Going back Jan. 4! It's not like I want to go away early, I just don't want to be here anymore. Does that make sense? My mom is starting to bug me about leaving my shoes downstairs, getting a haircut, wearing sneakers and all that junk. And mostly, I annoy her so I'm sure she wants me to go to, lol. And my bed is too small and my room is uncomfortable and I'm bored all the time and uhhhhhhhhhh, I just want to go. I'm glad I called Dan because I'm sure he wouldn't tell me the date to leave till the night before. But I'm glad I'm going up earlier then I could have cool weather, my special pillow, a comfortable bed and I could be on my own again. It doesnt seem as homey here as it used to be. It just feels like the past and I have moved on so thats why it kind of feels weird here. I love my mom, my grandparents and my cousin, but we dont have to see each other every freakin day. lol. Well I'm glad I'm going back earlier than I thought and it was nice hanging out with my old friends. If I had a car I'd go to Orlando or Gainesville to visit them. Oh well. Maybe they can visit me. HA!!! Yeah right.

Just got back from the family dinner tonight. It was nice seeing the little kids and old people again. And I have pictures of my mom singing kareoke. Did something put something in her drink? lol, she doesnt drink. White Jamaican rum, whoa. Too much for me. I cant believe how nice everyone looked, you should have seen them. The old people think they're my age. Anyways, Merry Christmas and watch A Christmas Story on TBS all day long tomorrow.

Fue al Miami a veo Brokeback Mountain en Miami miercoles noche. Or whatever. It taught me that I dont want to be white, I dont want to have a sucky life, Jack is a slut, dont have a double life and camping in the woods or the mountain looks like fun. After the movie, we walked down Lincol road and sat on the beach. Yeah, it was cold as heck. We started  walking back and stopped at one of the only restaurants open 2 something in the morning and had pizza. It was really good, they were all specialty pizzas with cool toppings. Yesterday, I went to the mall with my mom and went to my grandparents house for a bit. When we got home I took the car and went to the mall to get a little something for Steve and Gio because I saw something that Gio would really like so I figured I'd have to get Steve something. I wanted it to be thoughtful. I like thoughtful gifts, not, "Oh it's Christmas so I have to buy you a gift because that's what you do around this time of year" gift. So I got their junk and I went to Gio's to give him his gift. Then I went home and waited till Steve and everyone else to arrive to go do whatever, we never plan anything. Okay, skipping over to the part where we actually did something, we went to Ihop and I got hot chocolate because IHOP makes fantastic hot chocolate. Then I had a milkshake. Then we went to the beach and played frisbee and junk and it was fun. UNtil we started talking. I knew it was going to be trouble, but they wanted to play, so I played. Anyways, Gio and Steven are being themselves and I cant deal with it anymore. Gio is mad at me for some reason and Steven, I dont know. He left his gift here so I guess he really doesnt care so I'm gonna go return it. Enough about that. I just wanted to end this with saying I really really dont like my brother. I am trying to avoid saying hate, but it's really hard right now. I hope he gets everything taken away from him for christmas and given to me, because that was grimy and I hate him. Opps, oh well. It came out.

Okay, I'm really fucking upset. I waited too damn long to get the gosh darn superman ring. I kind of didnt want to order it online because I wanted to see it and try it on in person. I called every Hot Topic in Tampa, Ft. Lauderdale and Miami and it was only at ONE store at Aventura Mall. I called them to ask what sizes they have so I did waste time and gas going all the way over there. THey only had size ten left and of course that's way too big for me. So I'm like, whatever, I'll order it online. I go to the website and they only have size ten and eleven left. WTF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Damnit! I could have ordered it the day I saw it with my size and everything/ . I'm so damn upset. And it's only twelve dollars!!!!!!!!! Fuck. I hate cursing. I've wanted that ring since the seventh grade when I first saw it. Many of you dont know this, but that used to be my symbol. I had a superman charm from like sixth grade to ninth grade when I lost it. THis is why I hate waiting and I get things as soon as I see something, especially if it's a good deal and in limited supply. Hold on to your love and never let it go. Be aggressive and dont be afraid to show your feelings for them. Let them know how you feel because they may feel the same way about you. Dont distance yourself from them, dont be afraid to be close. Man, that ring was so close! I could feel it in may hands. Damn damn damn. At least I saved twelve bucks??????????/ uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

Does anyone have any weed? Or any other kind of narcotic substance that I could be under the influence of? I need to get some things off my mind and escape. It's not all that bad, at least right now. I do enjoy being high on life though and not having to need any other outside forces to solve my problems, but sometimes I feel like I need an outside influence to get some stuff of my mind, clear my head and escape for a while. I dont think I'd ever allow myself to do it, I just like talking about it because I wonder what if I stoop to that level. Hmmmmm..................

My feet are numb. I walked over five miles. Walked through this weird neighborhood between 50th and 56th St. Walked across the street to McDonalds and bought a double cheeseburger and strawberry milkshake. Then I walked back home. It took two hours, I was kind of disappointed, I want to be away for more than that. I dont want to be here alone. It feels so weird and lonely here being by myself and there is so much going on. I'm gonna lie down and listen to the silent hum of my computer and the fridge gargling. Goodnight.

Journals are good for organizing your thoughts and helping you think about certain ideas. Writing them down on a peice of paper may help to get all the confusion out of your head and get them on solid paper. Livejournal is healing in that way too, but also in another way. It's more public then writing in a private journal so it helps you talk to people without talking to them directly which can help if you cant say something in words or get yourself to talk to someone in person. So why did I just post a private entry? Maybe it's because I don't want people to worry and it's more of a personal problem that cannot really be helped and I dont want people to feel sorry that they can't help, not that they would anyways. Does anyone else post private entries? And for what reason?

.............Aeon Flux- Good movie. Go see it, just don't get lost. It could seem complicated but it will clear up. This week went by fast and I hope the next two weeks go by fast too, so much stuff to do and I'm not ready to do it. Can I just skip a couple years until I'm out of college? That would be awesome. School sux, life is hard, I have too much personal issues that distract me more than anything. What's on the bright side? There is no brightside. Only darkness. Like the darkside of the moon. Someone shine a light on me. (Ooooo, that was good)

Paper due Monday, Portfolio due Monday, test on Tues., 2 tests on Wednesday, Paper due next Fri. And what am I doing? Writing this entry and thinking about going to see Aeon Flux tonight and Sam's party. And I'm sooooooo excited about going to see Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe. I go to the website like everyday. So many good movies are coming out next week, including that and Memoirs of a Geisha and Brokeback Mountain. Memoirs of a Geisha is a book, I've never read it but the previews look really good. I like cultural historical movies like that; like Tha Last Samauri and The Last Emperor and Mulan. lol. A couple weeks ago I found out that Brokeback Mountain was a short story that was published in the New Yorker a couple years ago so I read that and now I'm even more excited to see that movie too. The previews look pretty accurate to the story. There's some good actors in it and it's directed by Ang Lee so it should be a good movie. I think I need egg nog. I can't live without it. One of the main things I look foward to to the holiday season is egg nog and pumpkin pie. They should sell them year round. Egg nog. Damnit, Egg nog! It's always on my mind. I can't stop thinking about it. I wonder if I'll dream about it tonight. Wow, what if all the raindrops werent candy drops and gum drops, what if it was egg nog? OOooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh my gosh. Oh my gosh, egg nog rain. Oh my gosh. Rivers of egg nog. oh my god, it's so hard to write right now. Mountains would be covered in Egg nog ice cream. I can't wait to go home and buy Egg nog Ice Cream. Could one live on just Egg nog? Am I the only one who likes egg nog that much? Because a lot of people don't like it. They're just bloomin crazy, I dont understand them. They have no idea, I feel sorry for them and I hate them a little bit. I do, I hate them. I think egg nog needs a little more appreciation. If it were running for president, I would so vote for it. Who is reading this crazy shit anyways. It's so embarassing for people to read about how much I'm crazy in love with egg nog but I dont care. I'm not ashamed I'll shout it to the whole world on the highest mountain top that I am in love with egg nog. What if egg nog was a person! I'm afraid of how I'd react so I'm not even gonna think about that.uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh i love egg nog. Right now I am ignoring all my i.m.'s to express my love for egg nog. Oh my gosh I'm sinning. This is glutny! You can't love food this much. Omg, lord forgive me. Egg nog, I thik we're gonna have to take a break. It can't go on like this. You're breaking my heart because I can't love you this much but I do and it's wrong. I'm sorry, it's not you, it's me. I hope you still see me as the same old Shawn. Eileen, come get this egg nog out of my fridge, it hurts my body to know that it's in there, waiting to be consumed. I'm so sorry. Will you forgive me? I need a therapist. Now I'm thinking of being in a museum with works of art with egg nog in them. Okay, I have to focus on something else right now. Hello light. How are you? You're so bright tonight. I appreciate how you're always there whenver I need to see something in the dark. Thanks. I love light. Okay, I'm gonna try and go to bed and keep my focus on the wonderful light of life. egg nog
